summary: Tinder is a popular dating app started in 2012. It lets people create profiles with photos and information. Users can "swipe right" to like or "swipe left" to dislike other profiles. If two people like each other, they can message. In 2022, Tinder had millions of users and created over 65 billion matches worldwide. It's a fun and easy way to meet new people online.
title: Tinder (app)
